config.name: smb_domain
config.label: SAMBA domain name
config.help: The name of your Microsoft domain. Use only alphanumeric characters and dots like: mandriva.int. It Must NOT start with short host name. Avoid the .local domain to not conflict with Zeroconf/Bonjour protocols.

config.name: dns_ip
config.label: DNS server IP
config.help: The IP address of the DNS server

config.name: smb_passwd
config.label: Administrator password
config.help: Password for the Microsoft domain Administrator account. Password must be composed, at least, of 8 characters with one number, one capital letter and one lowercase letter.
